name: Baking Soda and Vinegar
description:
You can play the game in a browser at: http://www.davetech.co.uk/xkcdjam1

We made this game for the XKCD Jam, running 17th to 20th November 2017.
The idea is that you make a game based on an xkcd comic or what if? article.
We chose “Baking Soda and Vinegar” https://xkcd.com/1611/ 

We drew everything, coded everything and recorded the sound completely from scratch this weekend.
(except the dinosaur haha)

All the details for the jam and submissions can be found at: https://itch.io/jam/xkcdgamejam


Description:
Oh no the volcano has erupted! Run away and save yourself, watch out for those rocks and craters though!

Controls:
A / Left arrow - move left
D / Right arrow - move right
W / Space - jump
R / click - Reset game

Twitter: @DavesInHisPants
